metadata.title: CVE-2021-47091 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mac80211: fix locking in ieee80211_start_ap error path We need to hold thelocal->mtx to release the channel context, as even encoded by thelockdep_assert_held() there. Fix it.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
